sentences.en: a primary teacher
sentences.cn: 一名小学老师

sentences.en: a primary tumour
sentences.cn: 早期肿瘤

sentences.en: Britain did not introduce compulsory primary education until 1880.
sentences.cn: 直到1880年，英国才开始实行初等义务教育。

sentences.en: Counselling was given as a primary therapy for depression.
sentences.cn: 心理咨询是抑郁症的初步疗法。

sentences.en: First of all we should make primary education universal.
sentences.cn: 首先我们应普及初等教育.

sentences.en: His misunderstanding of language was the primary cause of his other problems.
sentences.cn: 他对语言的误解是引起其他问题的主要原因。

sentences.en: Intake in state primary schools is down by 10 %.
sentences.cn: 公立小学入学人数下降了10%.

sentences.en: It comes in bright primary colours that kids will love.
sentences.cn: 它用的都是孩子们喜欢的亮丽原色。

sentences.en: It is nearly always women who are the primary care givers.
sentences.cn: 从事初级保健护理工作的几乎都是女性。

sentences.en: Many of the villagers rely on fishing as their primary source of income.
sentences.cn: 很多村民以打鱼作为他们的主要收入来源。

sentences.en: New York holds its primary election on Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 纽约州将在星期二举行预选。

sentences.en: Ninety-nine per cent of primary pupils now have hands-on experience of computers.
sentences.cn: 现在，99%的小学生都亲手操作过电脑。

sentences.en: Our primary concern is to provide the refugees with food and health care.
sentences.cn: 我们的头等大事是向难民提供食品和医疗。

sentences.en: Our primary concern must be the children.
sentences.cn: 我们首先要关心的必须是儿童。

sentences.en: Personal safety is of primary importance .
sentences.cn: 人身安全至关重要。

sentences.en: primary and secondary education
sentences.cn: 中、小学教育

sentences.en: primary causes
sentences.cn: 最初的原因

sentences.en: primary education
sentences.cn: 小学教育

sentences.en: She quotes secondary and primary sources without distinction.
sentences.cn: 她对二手资料和一手资料的引用毫无区别。

sentences.en: teaching at primary level
sentences.cn: 小学程度教学

sentences.en: The company has targeted adults as its primary customers.
sentences.cn: 这家公司将成年人作为其主要顾客。

sentences.en: The disease is still in its primary stage.
sentences.cn: 这病尚处于初始阶段。

sentences.en: The primary aim of this course is to improve your spoken English.
sentences.cn: 这门课的主要目的是提高英语会话能力。

sentences.en: The primary cause of Tom's failure is his laziness.
sentences.cn: 汤姆失败的根本原因是懒惰.

sentences.en: They put a high premium on prevention and primary care.
sentences.cn: 他们对预防和初级护理极为重视。

sentences.en: This is the primary impetus behind the economic recovery.
sentences.cn: 这是促使经济复苏的主要动力.

words.tran_cn: 被压抑童年情绪的释放
初期；青年；精华；全盛时期
初级读本；识字课本；原始物
释放（被压抑的童年情绪）

phrases.tran_cn: 初级治疗，初级护理；基层医疗
一次能源；最初的电子能量
主因子，准素因子；一次因素
初级市场；初次市场（即证券发行机构）

trans.tran_cn: 首要的，初级的，初等教育的，最重要的
